INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the plasma concentrations and of the effectiveness of the tyrosine kinase inhibitor, due to increase of its metabolism by the enzymatic inducer

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of increase of the undesirable effects of the tyrosine kinase inhibitor due to decrease of its metabolism
